header.title: snmpm_conf

erlref.modulesummary: Utility functions for handling the manager config files.

description.p: The module snmpm_conf contains various utility functions to used for manipulating (write/append/read) the config files of the SNMP manager.

desc.p: An opaque data structure containg all configuration for one agent for the manager.
An opaque data structure that represents one configuration entry for the manager.
An opaque data structure containg all configuration for one user for the manager.
An opaque data structure containg information about security data for usm for the manager.
Create an entry for the manager config file, manager.conf.
The type of Val depends on the value of Tag, see Manager Information for more info.

func.name: write_manager_config(Dir, Conf) -> ok
write_manager_config(Dir, Hdr, Conf) -> ok
func.fsummary: Write the manager config to the config file

desc.p: Write the manager config to the manager config file.
Dir is the path to the directory where to store the config file.
Hdr is an optional file header (note that this text is written to the file as is).
See Manager Information for more info.

func.fsummary: Append the manager config to the config file

desc.p: Append the config to the current manager config file.
Dir is the path to the directory where to store the config file.
See Manager Information for more info.

func.name: read_manager_config(Dir) -> Conf
func.fsummary: Read the manager config from the config file

desc.p: Read the current manager config file.
Dir is the path to the directory where to store the config file.
See Manager Information for more info.
Create an entry for the manager users config file, users.conf.
users_entry(UserId) translates to the following call: users_entry(UserId, snmpm_user_default).
users_entry(UserId, UserMod) translates to the following call: users_entry(UserId, UserMod, undefined).
See Users for more info.
